name: MEC Surprise Gloves 2019 - Men's
description:
You can't do without gloves, but space in your pack is at a premium. Enter the highly compressible Surprise Gloves. The exterior sheds water and blocks gusts, the insulation adds warmth so you can unfold a map or unwrap a snack without fumbling. They're touchscreen-compatible for sending a quick text or taking an epic panorama from the summit.Shell fabric is windproof, lightweight polyester ripstop with a TPU laminate and DWR finish for weather protection.Brushed polyester tricot fleece liner is soft and cozy against the skin.Thermolite Micro polyester insulation, 180g weight on backs and outer thumb, 100g on palms and inner thumb.Thumb, fingers and palm are touchscreen compatible.Elastic cuff seals out drafts.

        Sustainability
